item.title: How to Create an Empty Git Branch
item.description: What do I mean by an empty branch? Simply, a branch with no commits. Why on earth… Why would one even need an empty branch? For example tox does this: the current main version is on master the upcoming version 4, which is a complete rewrite, is on the rewrite branch.
